lorann.game.model.element.motion

Class Hero

  • java.lang.Object
    • lorann.game.model.element.Element
      • lorann.game.model.element.motion.Mobile
        • lorann.game.model.element.motion.Hero

  • public class Hero
extends lorann.game.model.element.motion.Mobile
    The hero class it has an int lastimgnum to handle animations a haveFireball to limit the fireball to one at a time and refresh it when looted back.
    Author:
    Game

        public void move(lorann.game.model.Direction u)
        this hero changes its image depending on the direction he's going.
        Parameters:
        u - it is important to notice that the direction changes before any call to the super.move method ( which makes the direction system used in this game useful )
